description.zh-cn: 中国佤族政治人物，中国共产党党员，第十三届全国人民代表大会云南省代表。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Wa ethnicity, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a deputy from Yunnan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，魏金龙的籍贯地及政治代表地区。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, the ancestral home and political representation area of Wei Jinlong.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国云南省的自治县，是魏金龙的籍贯地。
description.en: An autonomous county in Yunnan Province, China, and the ancestral home of Wei Jinlong.

description.zh-cn: 中国的少数民族之一，是魏金龙所属的民族。
description.en: One of the ethnic minorities in China, to which Wei Jinlong belongs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关，任期为2018年至2023年。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, serving from 2018 to 2023.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会代表名单

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会代表名单
en: List of deputies to the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 记录了中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会所有代表的名单。
description.en: A document listing all the deputies to the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext中的“西盟人”，推断其出生或籍贯地为西盟。
description.en: Based on the text "西盟人" (person from Ximeng), his place of birth or origin is inferred to be Ximeng.
Wei Jinlong is of the Wa ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 魏金龙是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wei Jinlong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，魏金龙被选为云南省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Wei Jinlong was elected as a deputy from Yunnan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.
